## AudioEventPayloads."AUDIO.SET\_ATTACHED\_TO\_ENTITY" property

Emitted when the audio is attached to an entity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[AudioEvent.SET_ATTACHED_TO_ENTITY]: {
        audio: Audio;
        entity: Entity | undefined;
    };
```
